title: Jamie Foxx steps out with mystery female companion following dinner at Mr Chow
text:
He hit headlines when his split from his girlfriend Katie Holmes was announced in August, following a relatively private, six-year romance.

And Jamie Foxx appeared to put his recent break-up firmly behind him as he enjoyed dinner at celebrity hotspot Mr Chow with a mystery companion in Los Angeles on Tuesday evening.

The screen star, 51 - who recently denied he's dating his protégé Sela Vale, 21 - looked typically stylish in a navy T-shirt and dark-wash jeans as he greeted fans on departure from the eatery.

In good company: Jamie Foxx (L) enjoyed dinner at celebrity hotspot Mr Chow with a mystery companion (R) in Los Angeles on Tuesday afternoon

Holding on to his grey trilby, The Amazing Spider-Man 2 actor strolled across the streets of the Californian city in white canvas trainers.

Meanwhile, his stunning female pal flashed a hint of her toned midsection in a black crop top and clingy jeans, tied in with a denim jacket and white ankle boots.

The screen star recently denied rumours of a romantic relationship with singer Sela after they were spotted holding hands in August.

Rumoured girlfriend: The screen star, 51, recently denied he's dating his protégé Sela Vale, 21 (pictured in August)

Taking to Instagram Live later that month, the media personality firmly shut down the reports - pointing out that the musician is younger than his daughter Corinne, 25 - who he shares with ex Connie Kline.

Sharing context to their outing, Jamie said in the clip: 'I'm escorting her to my car, to put her in the car - my artist, who hangs out with my kids and is as young as my daughter.

'People try to make mountains out of molehills. We want to treat her the same way and give her the same opportunities. I told her it's going to be this way.

Flirty: Despite shutting down relationship rumours, the TV and film star set tongues wagging when he posted a flirty comment under Sela's sizzling social media snap on Sunday

'It's a double standard when it comes to women. I spoke to that girl's mom, and she put her trust in me. We want to make sure she has the opportunity to show you the talent we saw.'

Despite the confirmation, the TV and film star set tongues wagging when he posted a flirty comment under Sela's sizzling social media snap on Sunday, as he penned: 'Kill em din!!' alongside fire emojis.

The actor - who also shares 10-year-old daughter Annalise Bishop with Kristin Grannis - first went public with actress Katie in 2017, four years after they first embarked on a romance.

Meanwhile, prior to their courtship, Katie was married to Tom Cruise, with whom she shares daughter Suri, 13.
description: The screen star, 51, appeared to put his recent break-up firmly behind him as he enjoyed dinner at celebrity hotspot Mr Chow with a mystery companion in Los Angeles on Tuesday evening.
